attributes.action: Medieval plantagent and chaucer ballards and poetry song month
attributes.additional_details:
The aim of this petition is to get the govement to create a Medieval plantagent and Chaucer ballard and poetry and song moth to be part of diversity programmes in schools and work places covering such aspect

Canterbury Pilgrims literature of Chaucer and pilgrims
Medieval worship pilgrim folk song and ballards
Plantangent
folk Minstfral dances and theatre
Medieval food
people dressed up trational folk dress of Canterbury and London and south of England from the period
